FuncDef: This command configures a TCA for the counter capturing error drops. An error drop TCA can be created for traffic generated from the subscriber side of AA (from-sub) or for traffic generated from the network toward the AA subscriber (to-sub). Thecreatekeyword is mandatory when creating an error-drop TCA.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the traffic direction. Values-from-sub, to-sub.
Keyword used to create the error drop TCA.
